remarks: Apartness of reals is tight.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  (This restates ~ ax-pre-apti with ordering on the extended reals.)  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 29-Jan-2020.)
statement: axapti $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ -. ( A < B \/ B < A ) ) -> A = B ) $.
